verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who shall dwell <S%H1481><s%> in your sanctuary? <S%H168><s%> Who shall live <S%H7931><s%> on your holy <S%H6944><s%> hill? <S%H2022><s%>
He who walks <S%H1980><s%> blamelessly <S%H8549><s%> does <S%H6466><s%> what is right, <S%H6664><s%> and speaks <S%H1696><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> in his heart; <S%H3824><s%>

He who doesn't <S%H7270><s%> slander with his tongue, <S%H3956><s%> nor does <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to his friend, <S%H7453><s%> nor casts <S%H5375><s%> slurs <S%H2781><s%> against his fellow man; <S%H7138><s%>

In whose eyes <S%H5869><s%> a vile man <S%H3988><s%> is despised, <S%H959><s%> but who honors <S%H3513><s%> those who fear <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> he who keeps an oath <S%H7650><s%> even when it hurts, <S%H7489><s%> and doesn't <S%H4171><s%> change;

he who doesn't <S%H5414><s%> lend out his money <S%H3701><s%> for usury, <S%H5392><s%> nor take <S%H3947><s%> a bribe <S%H7810><s%> against the innocent. <S%H5355><s%> He who does <S%H6213><s%> these things shall never <S%H5769><s%> be shaken. <S%H4131><s%>
